text: Kyunghee Law School is one of the professional graduate schools of Kyunghee University, located in Suwon, South Korea. Founded in 2009, it is one of the founding law schools in South Korea and is one of the smaller schools with each class in the three-year J.D. program having approximately 60 students. == Programs== == References == == Website == * Official Website Category:Kyung Hee University Category:Law schools in South Korea ko:경희대학교 법학전문대학원
title: Kyunghee Law School
